text: Karol "Karcsi" Emil Divín (born Karol Finster; 22 February 1936 – 6 April 2022) was a Hungarian-born Slovak-Czech figure skater who represented Czechoslovakia. He was the 1960 Olympic silver medalist. He also was a two- time European champion (1958–59), and a two-time World medalist. He was born in Budapest, Hungary. Divín died on 6 April 2022 in Brno, Czech Republic at the age of 86.Zemřel elegán na ledě!
